snippet: Honest Dollar is part of a group of investment companies vying for small-business employees who do not have access to traditional employer-sponsored savings plans.
abstract: Goldman Sachs is buying Honest Dollar, digital retirement savings tool for small-business employees, for undisclosed terms.
lead_paragraph: Honest Dollar is part of a group of investment companies vying for small-business employees who do not have access to traditional employer-sponsored savings plans.

headline.main: Goldman Sachs to Buy Honest Dollar, a Small Plan Start-Up
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Goldman Buys Honest Dollar, a Digital Savings Tool
